list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an official list or record, for example of births, marriages, and deaths, of shipping, or of historic places.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một sổ đăng ký thành viên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a particular part of the range of a voice or instrument.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his voice moved up a register
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: giọng anh di chuyển lên một sổ đăng ký

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a variety of a language or a level of usage, as determined by degree of formality and choice of vocabulary, pronunciation, and syntax, according to the communicative purpose, social context, and social status of the user.
the exact correspondence of the position of color components in a printed positive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it was reproduced in full color but unfortunately out of register
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nó được sao chép đầy đủ màu sắc nhưng không may ra khỏi sổ đăng ký

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in electronic devices) a location in a store of data, used for a specific purpose and with quick access time.
an adjustable plate for widening or narrowing an opening and regulating a draft, especially in a fire grate.
one of a number of bands or sections into which a design is divided.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the central register shows a Roman Emperor on horseback
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đăng ký trung tâm cho thấy một hoàng đế La Mã trên lưng ngựa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: enter or record on an official list or directory.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the vessel is registered as Liberian
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tàu được đăng ký là Liberian

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an instrument) detect and show (a reading) automatically.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the electroscope was too insensitive to register the tiny changes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Electroscope quá nhạy cảm với việc đăng ký những thay đổi nhỏ xíu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: express or convey (an opinion or emotion).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I wish to register an objection
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi muốn đăng ký phản đối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: correspond or cause to correspond exactly in position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they are adjusted until the impressions register
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chúng được điều chỉnh cho đến khi đăng ký ấn tượng
